20101223184000.000|20101223184002.000|TR0|
20101223184002.000|20101223184005.000|TR0|WOLF BLITZER, HOST, "THE SITUATION ROOM" 
20101223184005.000|20101223184007.000|TR0|(voice-over):  The North Korean capital is 
20101223184007.000|20101223184009.000|TR0|a lot different than I thought.  Take, for 
20101223184009.000|20101223184011.000|TR0|example, the subway system.  It takes 
20101223184011.000|20101223184014.000|TR0|forever to get to the underground station. 
20101223184014.000|20101223184016.000|TR0| I never saw such long escalators, even 
20101223184016.000|20101223184018.000|TR0|longer than the ones at the Washington 
20101223184018.000|20101223184021.000|TR0|D.C. Metro.  So deep that it could and 
20101223184021.000|20101223184023.000|TR0|does double as an underground bunker.

20101223184816.000|20101223184818.000|TR0|
20101223184818.000|20101223184820.000|TR0|Scott, tell us about this.  What's 
20101223184820.000|20101223184822.000|TR0|innovative about a system that helps you

20101223184827.000|20101223184829.000|TR0|SCOTT VAN BRUNT, GROUP LEADER FOR WINNING

20101223184832.000|20101223184834.000|TR0|well, we were working with Jiffy Lube, 
20101223184834.000|20101223184836.000|TR0|which is the biggest oil change provider 
20101223184836.000|20101223184838.000|TR0|in the U.S. And what they really wanted to 
20101223184838.000|20101223184841.000|TR0|figure out is how to help consumers like 
20101223184841.000|20101223184843.000|TR0|myself, Generation Y consumers - so, those 
20101223184843.000|20101223184845.000|TR0|16 to 30 - really do, a better job of 
20101223184845.000|20101223184847.000|TR0|maintaining the vehicle and how Jiffy Lube 
20101223184847.000|20101223184850.000|TR0|can work with them.
20101223184850.000|20101223184852.000|TR0|
20101223184852.000|20101223184854.000|TR0|And what we helped them develop was an 
20101223184854.000|20101223184857.000|TR0|online portal to really simplify the car 
20101223184857.000|20101223184859.000|TR0|management process and the maintenance 
20101223184859.000|20101223184901.000|TR0|process by taking the records online, by 
20101223184901.000|20101223184903.000|TR0|creating a personalized game plan for your 
20101223184903.000|20101223184906.000|TR0|car and your vehicle, and giving you the 
20101223184906.000|20101223184908.000|TR0|tools via online tools, text messaging, et 
20101223184908.000|20101223184910.000|TR0|cetera that lets you know how and when to 
20101223184910.000|20101223184912.000|TR0|maintain your vehicle.
20101223184912.000|20101223184915.000|TR0|
20101223184915.000|20101223184917.000|TR0|VELSHI: Tell me what the innovation here 
20101223184917.000|20101223184919.000|TR0|is.  I mean, look.  I know most people 
20101223184919.000|20101223184922.000|TR0|don't look in their manual, which should 
20101223184922.000|20101223184924.000|TR0|tell you exactly when, based on either 
20101223184924.000|20101223184926.000|TR0|time or mileage, you change your oil or 
20101223184926.000|20101223184928.000|TR0|keep your tires inflated or take it in for 
20101223184928.000|20101223184931.000|TR0|a service.  When's the big advance here?
20101223184931.000|20101223184933.000|TR0|
20101223184933.000|20101223184935.000|TR0|VAN BRUNT:  Yes, that's exactly right.  I 
20101223184935.000|20101223184937.000|TR0|think most consumers think of it as a bit 
20101223184937.000|20101223184940.000|TR0|of a chore.  So what we wanted to do was 
20101223184940.000|20101223184942.000|TR0|really simplify the process.  And the way 
20101223184942.000|20101223184944.000|TR0|that we did that is we created this online 
20101223184944.000|20101223184947.000|TR0|portal that has two sets of features.
20101223184947.000|20101223184949.000|TR0|
20101223184949.000|20101223184951.000|TR0|So, the first is around personalization 
20101223184951.000|20101223184953.000|TR0|based on your vehicle, your vehicle's 
20101223184953.000|20101223184956.000|TR0|history, your current vehicle's current 
20101223184956.000|20101223184958.000|TR0|state as well as you as a driver yourself. 
20101223184958.000|20101223185000.000|TR0| How is it that you drive your car? Where 
20101223185000.000|20101223185002.000|TR0|do you drive it, how much do you drive it, 
20101223185002.000|20101223185005.000|TR0|what are the conditions?  What is the 
20101223185005.000|20101223185007.000|TR0|specific maintenance plan that we can lay 
20101223185007.000|20101223185009.000|TR0|out, kind of the road map over time for 
20101223185009.000|20101223185012.000|TR0|you to properly maintain your vehicle and 
20101223185012.000|20101223185014.000|TR0|maximize the value of your vehicle?  So, 
20101223185014.000|20101223185016.000|TR0|that's part one.
20101223185016.000|20101223185018.000|TR0|
20101223185018.000|20101223185021.000|TR0|VELSHI:  Now, Scott -
20101223185021.000|20101223185023.000|TR0|
20101223185023.000|20101223185025.000|TR0|VAN BRUNT:  Part two -
20101223185025.000|20101223185027.000|TR0|
20101223185027.000|20101223185030.000|TR0|VELSHI:  OK, go ahead.  Tell me about part 
20101223185030.000|20101223185032.000|TR0|two.       VAN BRUNT:  Sorry.  I was going 
20101223185032.000|20101223185034.000|TR0|to say part two is the set of interactive 
20101223185034.000|20101223185037.000|TR0|features that go along with that.  So, 
20101223185037.000|20101223185039.000|TR0|that is the reminders in terms of text 
20101223185039.000|20101223185041.000|TR0|messages and e-mail reminders of when to 
20101223185041.000|20101223185043.000|TR0|actually go do that as opposed to just a 
20101223185043.000|20101223185046.000|TR0|sticker in your window.  But also features 
20101223185046.000|20101223185048.000|TR0|such as multiparty maintenance of a car.
20101223185048.000|20101223185050.000|TR0|
20101223185050.000|20101223185052.000|TR0|So, for example, if you are an adult with 
20101223185052.000|20101223185055.000|TR0|a child at college and they're away 
20101223185055.000|20101223185057.000|TR0|somewhere else and you're worried about 
20101223185057.000|20101223185059.000|TR0|maintenance of that vehicle, our system

20101223185102.000|20101223185104.000|TR0|ownership of that.  For example, I can go 
20101223185104.000|20101223185106.000|TR0|on as a parent, see that my kid's car is

20101223185631.000|20101223185633.000|TR0|mine collapse.  The type of mine here is
